backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a request to change snowflake colors from red to blue tones in the SnowfallBackground component's drawSnowflake function.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components for a snowflakes-themed web application with animated backgrounds and gallery.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the 'Artistic Snowflakes Web Page' application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component composing Header, Hero, Gallery, Footer, and SnowfallBackground into a layered layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, caffeine.ai attribution link, and a poetic quote about snowflakes.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Gallery component rendering six snowflake images in a responsive grid with hover effects and modal dialogs for detailed viewing.
frontend/src/components/HailBackground.t: Empty file placeholder for a hail animation background component (no implementation present).
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying 'Crystalline Beauty' title with animated spinning snowflake icons on either side.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring poetic prose about snowflakes with elegant typography and centered layout.
frontend/src/components/RainBackground.t: Canvas-based animated rain background rendering elongated raindrops with gradient streaks, wind drift, devicePixelRatio support, and reduced-motion accessibility.
frontend/src/components/SnowfallBackgrou: Canvas-based animated snowfall background rendering circular particles with blue radial gradient glow, gentle falling speed, devicePixelRatio support, and reduced-motion accessibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, switching between anonymous and authenticated actors based on Internet Identity state, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flows, identity persistence via AuthClient, and delegation validation with configurable idle/expiry options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the application does not require backend queries and uses only static local content.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS with OKLCH-based design tokens defining a mauve light theme and deep fuchsia dark theme, including winter-specific color variables (glass, border, accent) and custom animations for the snowflake landing page.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts to the #root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with OKLCH color tokens (including winter.* namespace), custom animations (snowfall, float, shimmer), container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the Crystalline Beauty winter-themed landing page architecture, including React/Tailwind composition, ICP integration patterns, known issues (missing dialog component, dual CSS files), and a catalog of 15 existing features from layout to animations.
